name: thedailybeast
text:
Join us for the third night of the #DemConvention, with two of the most prominent Black Democrats: Sen. Kamala Harris and former President Barack Obama. Stay tuned for all the DNC highlights starting at 9 p.m. EST.

Here's a recap of night two: https://t.co/0qxC6PXVH7

name: thedailybeast
text: Kerry Washington is tonight’s #DemConvention moderator. She leads with a spotlight about combating gun violence.

“We can let the shooting continue, or we can act. We can protect our families, our future. We can vote,” she said. https://t.co/nLbTh94vP9

name: thedailybeast
text: For a candidate who was praised for her ability to “prosecute the case” against President Trump, Harris soon got down to the business of lacing into the incumbent’s record. She snuck in barely-veiled digs early, such as “I know a predator when I see one.” https://t.co/HCpGOFrK1R

name: thedailybeast
text:
